topic.title: Networking in Winter
topic.text: There was some confusion about Networking next quarter. I will be teaching Networking (4 credits) and it will be part of SOS. It can be taken as a separate thread. We will be using the Text Computer Networking by Kurose and Ross (8th edition). You can rent it. It is about how the Internet works. The topics include: overview of OSI and Internet layers, application layer (http), transport layer (TCP, UDP), networking (IPv4, IPv6), link layer (Ethernet). network performance and routers
